txt.en:
'I see that you have gained proficiency as an expert tailor! That is excellent, [placeholder]. You are showing remarkable progress.

'You are about ready to learn to be an artisan tailor, which is the next step along your path to mastery. To do this, though, you will need to prove your worth to the expert tailor in Esteldín.

'If you impress Fladdan, he may allow you to use the superior workbench to sew remarkable pieces of clothing from your artisan recipes. Not many have this honour!'

'If you impress Fladdan, he may allow you to use the superior workbench to sew remarkable pieces of clothing from your artisan recipes. Not many have this honour!'
Crafting: A Superior Workbench

Fladdan, the expert tailoring vendor, is in the Craft Hall in Esteldín.\n\nYou should complete Fladdan's tailoring task.
'You should speak with Fladdan at once.'

'I see that you have gained proficiency as an expert tailor! That is excellent, [placeholder]. You are showing remarkable progress.

'You are about ready to learn to be an artisan tailor, which is the next step along your path to mastery. To do this, though, you will need to prove your worth to the expert tailor in Esteldín.

'If you impress Fladdan, he may allow you to use the superior workbench to sew remarkable pieces of clothing from your artisan recipes. Not many have this honour!'
Fladdan is in the Crafting Hall in Esteldín.\n\nYou should tell Fladdan that you have successfully delivered all of the tailored goods you made.
'You should speak with Fladdan at once.'

'Well done, [placeholder]! You are truly ready to begin your journey as an artisan tailor and beyond. The superior workbenches can be found here, as well as in many high-level areas throughout Middle-earth. I look forward to hearing of your renown as a great tailor!'
You have grown swiftly and steadily as a Tailor and are now nearly ready to begin using more advanced facilities. The superior workbench awaits!
